news.headline: What's New? (2024/11/01)
news.content:
Not all routes are currently available, since this is an early access game.
You can read Vol. 1 and up to chapter five of Vol. 2 and 3.

news.headline: What's New? (2024/11/14)
news.content: Quick patch. Sláine's sprite (Shae's Mam) is now available, and a few new buttons have been added to the UI, which link to our Discord, Bluesky, Patreon, and Tumblr. This notification bell will also tell you what's new with the game, and for Itch users, it will let you know when new patches/downloads are available.

news.headline: What's New? (2025/01/06)
news.content: Quality of life patch! We've added: 1) The ability to hover over glossary terms for their translations/definitions. You'll still need to click for audio. 2) A link to a feedback form in our settings. If you're not in our Discord, use that to send us any bugs or typos! 3) An experimental save system. Once enabled in settings, you'll be able to save your choices by clicking the gear tab in each book.

news.headline: What's New? (2025/05/19)
news.content: The World Map has been updated! Now, if you click on certain map icons, you can explore the world of Tír na nÓg for yourself! Why don't you start by selecting the icons for Temair or Caisleán na nDaoine? Who knows where you might end up, or who you might meet along the way...
